task_definition_name: Mifos Mobile Wallet - Write A Blogpost Demonstrating Transfer Money via VPA, Mobile Number And QR Code
description:
Currently, MifosPay supports three options to transfer the amount from one account to another. The objective is to create a blog that demonstrate money transfer via VPA, Mobile Number, and QR Code. The link to the APK of the MifosPay App is an external URL to this task.

Submit a Gist for the same.

If you need help, be sure to post your question to our [developer mailing list](http://mifos.org/resources/community/communications/#mailing-lists) or email the corresponding mentors assigned to the task or you can message on [Gitter Channel](https://gitter.im/openMF/mifos) too.
